name: World of Commanders
storyline:
WORLD OF COMMANDERS is a strategy game based on the World War 2.   
   
It offers more than 500 historical units used by more than 60 countries during World War 2.   
   
You can collect more than 500 iconic World War 2 units from different countries such as M4 Sherman, Tiger, Panther, Mustang, and Spitfire.   
   
World of Commanders boasts realistic type effectiveness system based on more than mere level and grade as well as historical battle simulations from German invasion of Poland to Japan's defeat.   
   
In 'Campaign Mode', you can have war simulation of historical battles such Normandy Invasion and Battle of Stalingrad.   
   
In 'Operation Mode', you can build your base and defeat other users to occupy their territory.   
   
In 'Challenge Mode', enemies with different concept appear every day.   
   
Become stronger with your allies!   
Get free gold twice a day along with various PVP ranking rewards!    
   
World of Commanders will never make you feel bored.   
   
DOWNLOAD   
- Google: https://goo.gl/xTmSTG   
- Apple: https://goo.gl/sNZTb8
summary:
Be a page of history!   
Become the hero who leads the World War 2 to victory!   
   
WORLD OF COMMANDERS is a strategy game based on the World War 2.
